00083 typedef struct TransVert {
00084     float *loc;
00085     float oldloc[3], maploc[3], fac;
00086     float *val, oldval;
00087     int flag;
00088     float *nor;
00089 } TransVert;
00090 
00091               /* SELECT == (1 << 0) */
00092 #define TX_VERT_USE_MAPLOC (1 << 1)
00093 
00094 static TransVert *transvmain = NULL;
00095 static int tottrans = 0;
00096 
00097 /* copied from editobject.c, now uses (almost) proper depgraph */
00098 static void special_transvert_update(Object *obedit)
00099 {
00100     if (obedit) {
00101         DAG_id_tag_update(obedit->data, 0);
00102         
00103         if (obedit->type == OB_MESH) {
00104             Mesh *me = obedit->data;
00105             BM_mesh_normals_update(me->edit_btmesh->bm, TRUE);  // does face centers too
00106         }
00107         else if (ELEM(obedit->type, OB_CURVE, OB_SURF)) {
00108             Curve *cu = obedit->data;
00109             ListBase *nurbs = curve_editnurbs(cu);
00110             Nurb *nu = nurbs->first;
00111 
00112             while (nu) {
00113                 /* keep handles' vectors unchanged */
00114                 if (nu->bezt) {
00115                     int a = nu->pntsu;
00116                     TransVert *tv = transvmain;
00117                     BezTriple *bezt = nu->bezt;
00118 
00119                     while (a--) {
00120                         if (bezt->f1 & SELECT) tv++;
00121 
00122                         if (bezt->f2 & SELECT) {
00123                             float v[3];
00124 
00125                             if (bezt->f1 & SELECT) {
00126                                 sub_v3_v3v3(v, (tv - 1)->oldloc, tv->oldloc);
00127                                 add_v3_v3v3(bezt->vec[0], bezt->vec[1], v);
00128                             }
00129 
00130                             if (bezt->f3 & SELECT) {
00131                                 sub_v3_v3v3(v, (tv + 1)->oldloc, tv->oldloc);
00132                                 add_v3_v3v3(bezt->vec[2], bezt->vec[1], v);
00133                             }
00134 
00135                             tv++;
00136                         }
00137 
00138                         if (bezt->f3 & SELECT) tv++;
00139 
00140                         bezt++;
00141                     }
00142                 }
00143 
00144                 test2DNurb(nu);
00145                 testhandlesNurb(nu); /* test for bezier too */
00146                 nu = nu->next;
00147             }
00148         }
00149         else if (obedit->type == OB_ARMATURE) {
00150             bArmature *arm = obedit->data;
00151             EditBone *ebo;
00152             TransVert *tv = transvmain;
00153             int a = 0;
00154             
00155             /* Ensure all bone tails are correctly adjusted */
00156             for (ebo = arm->edbo->first; ebo; ebo = ebo->next) {
00157                 /* adjust tip if both ends selected */
00158                 if ((ebo->flag & BONE_ROOTSEL) && (ebo->flag & BONE_TIPSEL)) {
00159                     if (tv) {
00160                         float diffvec[3];
00161                         
00162                         sub_v3_v3v3(diffvec, tv->loc, tv->oldloc);
00163                         add_v3_v3(ebo->tail, diffvec);
00164                         
00165                         a++;
00166                         if (a < tottrans) tv++;
00167                     }
00168                 }
00169             }
00170             
00171             /* Ensure all bones are correctly adjusted */
00172             for (ebo = arm->edbo->first; ebo; ebo = ebo->next) {
00173                 if ((ebo->flag & BONE_CONNECTED) && ebo->parent) {
00174                     /* If this bone has a parent tip that has been moved */
00175                     if (ebo->parent->flag & BONE_TIPSEL) {
00176                         copy_v3_v3(ebo->head, ebo->parent->tail);
00177                     }
00178                     /* If this bone has a parent tip that has NOT been moved */
00179                     else {
00180                         copy_v3_v3(ebo->parent->tail, ebo->head);
00181                     }
00182                 }
00183             }
00184             if (arm->flag & ARM_MIRROR_EDIT)
00185                 transform_armature_mirror_update(obedit);
00186         }
00187         else if (obedit->type == OB_LATTICE) {
00188             Lattice *lt = obedit->data;
00189             
00190             if (lt->editlatt->latt->flag & LT_OUTSIDE)
00191                 outside_lattice(lt->editlatt->latt);
00192         }
00193     }
00194 }
00195 
00196 static void set_mapped_co(void *vuserdata, int index, const float co[3],
00197                           const float UNUSED(no[3]), const short UNUSED(no_s[3]))
00198 {
00199     void **userdata = vuserdata;
00200     BMEditMesh *em = userdata[0];
00201     TransVert *tv = userdata[1];
00202     BMVert *eve = EDBM_vert_at_index(em, index);
00203     
00204     if (BM_elem_index_get(eve) != -1 && !(tv[BM_elem_index_get(eve)].flag & TX_VERT_USE_MAPLOC)) {
00205         copy_v3_v3(tv[BM_elem_index_get(eve)].maploc, co);
00206         tv[BM_elem_index_get(eve)].flag |= TX_VERT_USE_MAPLOC;
00207     }
00208 }
00209 
00210 /* copied from editobject.c, needs to be replaced with new transform code still */
00211 /* mode flags: */
00212 #define TM_ALL_JOINTS       1 /* all joints (for bones only) */
00213 #define TM_SKIP_HANDLES     2 /* skip handles when control point is selected (for curves only) */
00214 static void make_trans_verts(Object *obedit, float *min, float *max, int mode)
00215 {
00216     Nurb *nu;
00217     BezTriple *bezt;
00218     BPoint *bp;
00219     TransVert *tv = NULL;
00220     MetaElem *ml;
00221     BMVert *eve;
00222     EditBone    *ebo;
00223     float total, center[3], centroid[3];
00224     int a;
00225 
00226     tottrans = 0; // global!
00227     
00228     INIT_MINMAX(min, max);
00229     zero_v3(centroid);
00230     
00231     if (obedit->type == OB_MESH) {
00232         Mesh *me = obedit->data;
00233         BMEditMesh *em = me->edit_btmesh;
00234         BMesh *bm = em->bm;
00235         BMIter iter;
00236         void *userdata[2] = {em, NULL};
00237         /*int proptrans= 0; */ /*UNUSED*/
00238         
00239         /* abuses vertex index all over, set, just set dirty here,
00240          * perhaps this could use its own array instead? - campbell */
00241 
00242         // transform now requires awareness for select mode, so we tag the f1 flags in verts
00243         tottrans = 0;
00244         if (em->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_VERTEX) {
00245             BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00246                 if (!BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN) && BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00247                     BM_elem_index_set(eve, 1); /* set_dirty! */
00248                     tottrans++;
00249                 }
00250                 else BM_elem_index_set(eve, 0);  /* set_dirty! */
00251             }
00252         }
00253         else if (em->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_EDGE) {
00254             BMEdge *eed;
00255 
00256             BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00257                 BM_elem_index_set(eve, 0);     /* set_dirty! */
00258             }
00259 
00260             BM_ITER_MESH (eed, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00261                 if (!BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN) && BM_elem_flag_test(eed, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00262                     BM_elem_index_set(eed->v1, 1); /* set_dirty! */
00263                     BM_elem_index_set(eed->v2, 1); /* set_dirty! */
00264                 }
00265             }
00266 
00267             BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00268                 if (BM_elem_index_get(eve)) tottrans++;
00269             }
00270         }
00271         else {
00272             BMFace *efa;
00273 
00274             BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00275                 BM_elem_index_set(eve, 0); /* set_dirty! */
00276             }
00277 
00278             BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00279                 if (!BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN) && BM_elem_flag_test(efa, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
00280                     BMIter liter;
00281                     BMLoop *l;
00282                     
00283                     BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00284                         BM_elem_index_set(l->v, 1); /* set_dirty! */
00285                     }
00286                 }
00287             }
00288 
00289             BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00290                 if (BM_elem_index_get(eve)) tottrans++;
00291             }
00292         }
00293         /* for any of the 3 loops above which all dirty the indices */
00294         bm->elem_index_dirty |= BM_VERT;
00295         
00296         /* and now make transverts */
00297         if (tottrans) {
00298             tv = transvmain = MEM_callocN(tottrans * sizeof(TransVert), "maketransverts");
00299         
00300             a = 0;
00301             BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00302                 if (BM_elem_index_get(eve)) {
00303                     BM_elem_index_set(eve, a); /* set_dirty! */
00304                     copy_v3_v3(tv->oldloc, eve->co);
00305                     tv->loc = eve->co;
00306                     if (eve->no[0] != 0.0f || eve->no[1] != 0.0f || eve->no[2] != 0.0f)
00307                         tv->nor = eve->no;  // note this is a hackish signal (ton)
00308                     tv->flag = BM_elem_index_get(eve) & SELECT;
00309                     tv++;
00310                     a++;
00311                 }
00312                 else {
00313                     BM_elem_index_set(eve, -1); /* set_dirty! */
00314                 }
00315             }
00316             /* set dirty already, above */
00317 
00318             userdata[1] = transvmain;
00319         }
00320         
00321         if (transvmain && em->derivedCage) {
00322             EDBM_index_arrays_init(em, 1, 0, 0);
00323             em->derivedCage->foreachMappedVert(em->derivedCage, set_mapped_co, userdata);
00324             EDBM_index_arrays_free(em);
00325         }
00326     }
00327     else if (obedit->type == OB_ARMATURE) {
00328         bArmature *arm = obedit->data;
00329         int totmalloc = BLI_countlist(arm->edbo);
00330 
00331         totmalloc *= 2;  /* probably overkill but bones can have 2 trans verts each */
00332 
00333         tv = transvmain = MEM_callocN(totmalloc * sizeof(TransVert), "maketransverts armature");
00334         
00335         for (ebo = arm->edbo->first; ebo; ebo = ebo->next) {
00336             if (ebo->layer & arm->layer) {
00337                 short tipsel = (ebo->flag & BONE_TIPSEL);
00338                 short rootsel = (ebo->flag & BONE_ROOTSEL);
00339                 short rootok = (!(ebo->parent && (ebo->flag & BONE_CONNECTED) && (ebo->parent->flag & BONE_TIPSEL)));
00340                 
00341                 if ((tipsel && rootsel) || (rootsel)) {
00342                     /* Don't add the tip (unless mode & TM_ALL_JOINTS, for getting all joints),
00343                      * otherwise we get zero-length bones as tips will snap to the same
00344                      * location as heads.
00345                      */
00346                     if (rootok) {
00347                         copy_v3_v3(tv->oldloc, ebo->head);
00348                         tv->loc = ebo->head;
00349                         tv->nor = NULL;
00350                         tv->flag = 1;
00351                         tv++;
00352                         tottrans++;
00353                     }   
00354                     
00355                     if ((mode & TM_ALL_JOINTS) && (tipsel)) {
00356                         copy_v3_v3(tv->oldloc, ebo->tail);
00357                         tv->loc = ebo->tail;
00358                         tv->nor = NULL;
00359                         tv->flag = 1;
00360                         tv++;
00361                         tottrans++;
00362                     }
00363                 }
00364                 else if (tipsel) {
00365                     copy_v3_v3(tv->oldloc, ebo->tail);
00366                     tv->loc = ebo->tail;
00367                     tv->nor = NULL;
00368                     tv->flag = 1;
00369                     tv++;
00370                     tottrans++;
00371                 }
00372             }
00373         }
00374     }
00375     else if (ELEM(obedit->type, OB_CURVE, OB_SURF)) {
00376         Curve *cu = obedit->data;
00377         int totmalloc = 0;
00378         ListBase *nurbs = curve_editnurbs(cu);
00379 
00380         for (nu = nurbs->first; nu; nu = nu->next) {
00381             if (nu->type == CU_BEZIER)
00382                 totmalloc += 3 * nu->pntsu;
00383             else
00384                 totmalloc += nu->pntsu * nu->pntsv;
00385         }
00386         tv = transvmain = MEM_callocN(totmalloc * sizeof(TransVert), "maketransverts curve");
00387 
00388         nu = nurbs->first;
00389         while (nu) {
00390             if (nu->type == CU_BEZIER) {
00391                 a = nu->pntsu;
00392                 bezt = nu->bezt;
00393                 while (a--) {
00394                     if (bezt->hide == 0) {
00395                         int skip_handle = 0;
00396                         if (bezt->f2 & SELECT)
00397                             skip_handle = mode & TM_SKIP_HANDLES;
00398 
00399                         if ((bezt->f1 & SELECT) && !skip_handle) {
00400                             copy_v3_v3(tv->oldloc, bezt->vec[0]);
00401                             tv->loc = bezt->vec[0];
00402                             tv->flag = bezt->f1 & SELECT;
00403                             tv++;
00404                             tottrans++;
00405                         }
00406                         if (bezt->f2 & SELECT) {
00407                             copy_v3_v3(tv->oldloc, bezt->vec[1]);
00408                             tv->loc = bezt->vec[1];
00409                             tv->val = &(bezt->alfa);
00410                             tv->oldval = bezt->alfa;
00411                             tv->flag = bezt->f2 & SELECT;
00412                             tv++;
00413                             tottrans++;
00414                         }
00415                         if ((bezt->f3 & SELECT) && !skip_handle) {
00416                             copy_v3_v3(tv->oldloc, bezt->vec[2]);
00417                             tv->loc = bezt->vec[2];
00418                             tv->flag = bezt->f3 & SELECT;
00419                             tv++;
00420                             tottrans++;
00421                         }
00422                     }
00423                     bezt++;
00424                 }
00425             }
00426             else {
00427                 a = nu->pntsu * nu->pntsv;
00428                 bp = nu->bp;
00429                 while (a--) {
00430                     if (bp->hide == 0) {
00431                         if (bp->f1 & SELECT) {
00432                             copy_v3_v3(tv->oldloc, bp->vec);
00433                             tv->loc = bp->vec;
00434                             tv->val = &(bp->alfa);
00435                             tv->oldval = bp->alfa;
00436                             tv->flag = bp->f1 & SELECT;
00437                             tv++;
00438                             tottrans++;
00439                         }
00440                     }
00441                     bp++;
00442                 }
00443             }
00444             nu = nu->next;
00445         }
00446     }
00447     else if (obedit->type == OB_MBALL) {
00448         MetaBall *mb = obedit->data;
00449         int totmalloc = BLI_countlist(mb->editelems);
00450         
00451         tv = transvmain = MEM_callocN(totmalloc * sizeof(TransVert), "maketransverts mball");
00452         
00453         ml = mb->editelems->first;
00454         while (ml) {
00455             if (ml->flag & SELECT) {
00456                 tv->loc = &ml->x;
00457                 copy_v3_v3(tv->oldloc, tv->loc);
00458                 tv->val = &(ml->rad);
00459                 tv->oldval = ml->rad;
00460                 tv->flag = 1;
00461                 tv++;
00462                 tottrans++;
00463             }
00464             ml = ml->next;
00465         }
00466     }
00467     else if (obedit->type == OB_LATTICE) {
00468         Lattice *lt = obedit->data;
00469         
00470         bp = lt->editlatt->latt->def;
00471         
00472         a = lt->editlatt->latt->pntsu * lt->editlatt->latt->pntsv * lt->editlatt->latt->pntsw;
00473         
00474         tv = transvmain = MEM_callocN(a * sizeof(TransVert), "maketransverts latt");
00475         
00476         while (a--) {
00477             if (bp->f1 & SELECT) {
00478                 if (bp->hide == 0) {
00479                     copy_v3_v3(tv->oldloc, bp->vec);
00480                     tv->loc = bp->vec;
00481                     tv->flag = bp->f1 & SELECT;
00482                     tv++;
00483                     tottrans++;
00484                 }
00485             }
00486             bp++;
00487         }
00488     }
00489     
00490     if (!tottrans && transvmain) {
00491         /* prevent memory leak. happens for curves/latticies due to */
00492         /* difficult condition of adding points to trans data */
00493         MEM_freeN(transvmain);
00494         transvmain = NULL;
00495     }
00496 
00497     /* cent etc */
00498     tv = transvmain;
00499     total = 0.0;
00500     for (a = 0; a < tottrans; a++, tv++) {
00501         if (tv->flag & SELECT) {
00502             add_v3_v3(centroid, tv->oldloc);
00503             total += 1.0f;
00504             DO_MINMAX(tv->oldloc, min, max);
00505         }
00506     }
00507     if (total != 0.0f) {
00508         mul_v3_fl(centroid, 1.0f / total);
00509     }
00510 
00511     mid_v3_v3v3(center, min, max);
00512 }
00513 
00514 /* *********************** operators ******************** */
00515 
00516 static int snap_sel_to_grid(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00517 {
00518     Main *bmain = CTX_data_main(C);
00519     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00520     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00521     RegionView3D *rv3d = CTX_wm_region_data(C);
00522     TransVert *tv;
00523     float gridf, imat[3][3], bmat[3][3], vec[3];
00524     int a;
00525 
00526     gridf = rv3d->gridview;
00527 
00528     if (obedit) {
00529         tottrans = 0;
00530         
00531         if (ELEM6(obedit->type, OB_ARMATURE, OB_LATTICE, OB_MESH, OB_SURF, OB_CURVE, OB_MBALL))
00532             make_trans_verts(obedit, bmat[0], bmat[1], 0);
00533         if (tottrans == 0) return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00534         
00535         copy_m3_m4(bmat, obedit->obmat);
00536         invert_m3_m3(imat, bmat);
00537         
00538         tv = transvmain;
00539         for (a = 0; a < tottrans; a++, tv++) {
00540             copy_v3_v3(vec, tv->loc);
00541             mul_m3_v3(bmat, vec);
00542             add_v3_v3(vec, obedit->obmat[3]);
00543             vec[0] = gridf * floorf(0.5f + vec[0] / gridf);
00544             vec[1] = gridf * floorf(0.5f + vec[1] / gridf);
00545             vec[2] = gridf * floorf(0.5f + vec[2] / gridf);
00546             sub_v3_v3(vec, obedit->obmat[3]);
00547             
00548             mul_m3_v3(imat, vec);
00549             copy_v3_v3(tv->loc, vec);
00550         }
00551         
00552         special_transvert_update(obedit);
00553         
00554         MEM_freeN(transvmain);
00555         transvmain = NULL;
00556     }
00557     else {
00558         struct KeyingSet *ks = ANIM_get_keyingset_for_autokeying(scene, ANIM_KS_LOCATION_ID);
00559 
00560         CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Object *, ob, selected_editable_objects) {
00561             if (ob->mode & OB_MODE_POSE) {
00562                 bPoseChannel *pchan;
00563                 bArmature *arm = ob->data;
00564                 
00565                 invert_m4_m4(ob->imat, ob->obmat);
00566                 
00567                 for (pchan = ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan = pchan->next) {
00568                     if (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_SELECTED) {
00569                         if (pchan->bone->layer & arm->layer) {
00570                             if ((pchan->bone->flag & BONE_CONNECTED) == 0) {
00571                                 float nLoc[3];
00572                                 
00573                                 /* get nearest grid point to snap to */
00574                                 copy_v3_v3(nLoc, pchan->pose_mat[3]);
00575                                 /* We must operate in world space! */
00576                                 mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, nLoc);
00577                                 vec[0] = gridf * (float)(floor(0.5f + nLoc[0] / gridf));
00578                                 vec[1] = gridf * (float)(floor(0.5f + nLoc[1] / gridf));
00579                                 vec[2] = gridf * (float)(floor(0.5f + nLoc[2] / gridf));
00580                                 /* Back in object space... */
00581                                 mul_m4_v3(ob->imat, vec);
00582                                 
00583                                 /* Get location of grid point in pose space. */
00584                                 armature_loc_pose_to_bone(pchan, vec, vec);
00585                                 
00586                                 /* adjust location */
00587                                 if ((pchan->protectflag & OB_LOCK_LOCX) == 0)
00588                                     pchan->loc[0] = vec[0];
00589                                 if ((pchan->protectflag & OB_LOCK_LOCY) == 0)
00590                                     pchan->loc[1] = vec[1];
00591                                 if ((pchan->protectflag & OB_LOCK_LOCZ) == 0)
00592                                     pchan->loc[2] = vec[2];
00593 
00594                                 /* auto-keyframing */
00595                                 ED_autokeyframe_pchan(C, scene, ob, pchan, ks);
00596                             }
00597                             /* if the bone has a parent and is connected to the parent,
00598                              * don't do anything - will break chain unless we do auto-ik.
00599                              */
00600                         }
00601                     }
00602                 }
00603                 ob->pose->flag |= (POSE_LOCKED | POSE_DO_UNLOCK);
00604                 
00605                 DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00606             }
00607             else {
00608                 ob->recalc |= OB_RECALC_OB;
00609                 
00610                 vec[0] = -ob->obmat[3][0] + gridf *floorf(0.5f + ob->obmat[3][0] / gridf);
00611                 vec[1] = -ob->obmat[3][1] + gridf *floorf(0.5f + ob->obmat[3][1] / gridf);
00612                 vec[2] = -ob->obmat[3][2] + gridf *floorf(0.5f + ob->obmat[3][2] / gridf);
00613                 
00614                 if (ob->parent) {
00615                     where_is_object(scene, ob);
00616                     
00617                     invert_m3_m3(imat, originmat);
00618                     mul_m3_v3(imat, vec);
00619                 }
00620                 if ((ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_LOCX) == 0)
00621                     ob->loc[0] += vec[0];
00622                 if ((ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_LOCY) == 0)
00623                     ob->loc[1] += vec[1];
00624                 if ((ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_LOCZ) == 0)
00625                     ob->loc[2] += vec[2];
00626                 
00627                 /* auto-keyframing */
00628                 ED_autokeyframe_object(C, scene, ob, ks);
00629             }
00630         }
00631         CTX_DATA_END;
00632     }
00633 
00634     DAG_ids_flush_update(bmain, 0);
00635     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT | ND_TRANSFORM, NULL);
00636     
00637     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00638 }
00639 
00640 void VIEW3D_OT_snap_selected_to_grid(wmOperatorType *ot)
00641 {
00642     /* identifiers */
00643     ot->name = "Snap Selection to Grid";
00644     ot->description = "Snap selected item(s) to nearest grid node";
00645     ot->idname = "VIEW3D_OT_snap_selected_to_grid";
00646     
00647     /* api callbacks */
00648     ot->exec = snap_sel_to_grid;
00649     ot->poll = ED_operator_region_view3d_active;
00650     
00651     /* flags */
00652     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
00653 }
00654 
00655 /* *************************************************** */
00656 
00657 static int snap_sel_to_curs(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00658 {
00659     Main *bmain = CTX_data_main(C);
00660     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00661     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00662     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
00663     TransVert *tv;
00664     float *curs, imat[3][3], bmat[3][3], vec[3];
00665     int a;
00666 
00667     curs = give_cursor(scene, v3d);
00668 
00669     if (obedit) {
00670         tottrans = 0;
00671         
00672         if (ELEM6(obedit->type, OB_ARMATURE, OB_LATTICE, OB_MESH, OB_SURF, OB_CURVE, OB_MBALL))
00673             make_trans_verts(obedit, bmat[0], bmat[1], 0);
00674         if (tottrans == 0) return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00675         
00676         copy_m3_m4(bmat, obedit->obmat);
00677         invert_m3_m3(imat, bmat);
00678         
00679         tv = transvmain;
00680         for (a = 0; a < tottrans; a++, tv++) {
00681             sub_v3_v3v3(vec, curs, obedit->obmat[3]);
00682             mul_m3_v3(imat, vec);
00683             copy_v3_v3(tv->loc, vec);
00684         }
00685         
00686         special_transvert_update(obedit);
00687         
00688         MEM_freeN(transvmain);
00689         transvmain = NULL;
00690     }
00691     else {
00692         struct KeyingSet *ks = ANIM_get_keyingset_for_autokeying(scene, ANIM_KS_LOCATION_ID);
00693 
00694         CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Object *, ob, selected_editable_objects) {
00695             if (ob->mode & OB_MODE_POSE) {
00696                 bPoseChannel *pchan;
00697                 bArmature *arm = ob->data;
00698                 
00699                 invert_m4_m4(ob->imat, ob->obmat);
00700                 copy_v3_v3(vec, curs);
00701                 mul_m4_v3(ob->imat, vec);
00702                 
00703                 for (pchan = ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan = pchan->next) {
00704                     if (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_SELECTED) {
00705                         if (pchan->bone->layer & arm->layer) {
00706                             if ((pchan->bone->flag & BONE_CONNECTED) == 0) {
00707                                 /* Get position in pchan (pose) space. */
00708                                 armature_loc_pose_to_bone(pchan, vec, vec);
00709 
00710                                 /* copy new position */
00711                                 if ((pchan->protectflag & OB_LOCK_LOCX) == 0)
00712                                     pchan->loc[0] = vec[0];
00713                                 if ((pchan->protectflag & OB_LOCK_LOCY) == 0)
00714                                     pchan->loc[1] = vec[1];
00715                                 if ((pchan->protectflag & OB_LOCK_LOCZ) == 0)
00716                                     pchan->loc[2] = vec[2];
00717 
00718                                 /* auto-keyframing */
00719                                 ED_autokeyframe_pchan(C, scene, ob, pchan, ks);
00720                             }
00721                             /* if the bone has a parent and is connected to the parent,
00722                              * don't do anything - will break chain unless we do auto-ik.
00723                              */
00724                         }
00725                     }
00726                 }
00727                 ob->pose->flag |= (POSE_LOCKED | POSE_DO_UNLOCK);
00728                 
00729                 DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00730             }
00731             else {
00732                 ob->recalc |= OB_RECALC_OB;
00733                 
00734                 vec[0] = -ob->obmat[3][0] + curs[0];
00735                 vec[1] = -ob->obmat[3][1] + curs[1];
00736                 vec[2] = -ob->obmat[3][2] + curs[2];
00737                 
00738                 if (ob->parent) {
00739                     where_is_object(scene, ob);
00740                     
00741                     invert_m3_m3(imat, originmat);
00742                     mul_m3_v3(imat, vec);
00743                 }
00744                 if ((ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_LOCX) == 0)
00745                     ob->loc[0] += vec[0];
00746                 if ((ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_LOCY) == 0)
00747                     ob->loc[1] += vec[1];
00748                 if ((ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_LOCZ) == 0)
00749                     ob->loc[2] += vec[2];
00750 
00751                 /* auto-keyframing */
00752                 ED_autokeyframe_object(C, scene, ob, ks);
00753             }
00754         }
00755         CTX_DATA_END;
00756     }
00757 
00758     DAG_ids_flush_update(bmain, 0);
00759     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT | ND_TRANSFORM, NULL);
00760     
00761     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00762 }

00779 /* *************************************************** */
00780 
00781 static int snap_curs_to_grid(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00782 {
00783     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00784     RegionView3D *rv3d = CTX_wm_region_data(C);
00785     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
00786     float gridf, *curs;
00787 
00788     gridf = rv3d->gridview;
00789     curs = give_cursor(scene, v3d);
00790 
00791     curs[0] = gridf * floorf(0.5f + curs[0] / gridf);
00792     curs[1] = gridf * floorf(0.5f + curs[1] / gridf);
00793     curs[2] = gridf * floorf(0.5f + curs[2] / gridf);
00794     
00795     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SPACE | ND_SPACE_VIEW3D, v3d);    // hrm
00796     
00797     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00798 }

00806     
00807     /* api callbacks */
00808     ot->exec = snap_curs_to_grid;

00810

00812     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;

00815 /* **************************************************** */
00816 
00817 static void bundle_midpoint(Scene *scene, Object *ob, float vec[3])
00818 {
00819     MovieClip *clip = object_get_movieclip(scene, ob, 0);
00820     MovieTracking *tracking;
00821     MovieTrackingObject *object;
00822     int ok = 0;
00823     float min[3], max[3], mat[4][4], pos[3], cammat[4][4] = MAT4_UNITY;
00824 
00825     if (!clip)
00826         return;
00827 
00828     tracking = &clip->tracking;
00829 
00830     copy_m4_m4(cammat, ob->obmat);
00831 
00832     BKE_get_tracking_mat(scene, ob, mat);
00833 
00834     INIT_MINMAX(min, max);
00835 
00836     for (object = tracking->objects.first; object; object = object->next) {
00837         ListBase *tracksbase = BKE_tracking_object_tracks(tracking, object);
00838         MovieTrackingTrack *track = tracksbase->first;
00839         float obmat[4][4];
00840 
00841         if (object->flag & TRACKING_OBJECT_CAMERA) {
00842             copy_m4_m4(obmat, mat);
00843         }
00844         else {
00845             float imat[4][4];
00846 
00847             BKE_tracking_get_interpolated_camera(tracking, object, scene->r.cfra, imat);
00848             invert_m4(imat);
00849 
00850             mult_m4_m4m4(obmat, cammat, imat);
00851         }
00852 
00853         while (track) {
00854             if ((track->flag & TRACK_HAS_BUNDLE) && TRACK_SELECTED(track)) {
00855                 ok = 1;
00856                 mul_v3_m4v3(pos, obmat, track->bundle_pos);
00857                 DO_MINMAX(pos, min, max);
00858             }
00859 
00860             track = track->next;
00861         }
00862     }
00863 
00864     if (ok) {
00865         mid_v3_v3v3(vec, min, max);
00866     }
00867 }
00868 
00869 static int snap_curs_to_sel(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00870 {
00871     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00872     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00873     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
00874     TransVert *tv;
00875     float *curs, bmat[3][3], vec[3], min[3], max[3], centroid[3];
00876     int count, a;
00877 
00878     curs = give_cursor(scene, v3d);
00879 
00880     count = 0;
00881     INIT_MINMAX(min, max);
00882     zero_v3(centroid);
00883 
00884     if (obedit) {
00885         tottrans = 0;
00886         
00887         if (ELEM6(obedit->type, OB_ARMATURE, OB_LATTICE, OB_MESH, OB_SURF, OB_CURVE, OB_MBALL))
00888             make_trans_verts(obedit, bmat[0], bmat[1], TM_ALL_JOINTS | TM_SKIP_HANDLES);
00889         if (tottrans == 0) return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00890         
00891         copy_m3_m4(bmat, obedit->obmat);
00892         
00893         tv = transvmain;
00894         for (a = 0; a < tottrans; a++, tv++) {
00895             copy_v3_v3(vec, tv->loc);
00896             mul_m3_v3(bmat, vec);
00897             add_v3_v3(vec, obedit->obmat[3]);
00898             add_v3_v3(centroid, vec);
00899             DO_MINMAX(vec, min, max);
00900         }
00901         
00902         if (v3d->around == V3D_CENTROID) {
00903             mul_v3_fl(centroid, 1.0f / (float)tottrans);
00904             copy_v3_v3(curs, centroid);
00905         }
00906         else {
00907             mid_v3_v3v3(curs, min, max);
00908         }
00909         MEM_freeN(transvmain);
00910         transvmain = NULL;
00911     }
00912     else {
00913         Object *obact = CTX_data_active_object(C);
00914         
00915         if (obact && (obact->mode & OB_MODE_POSE)) {
00916             bArmature *arm = obact->data;
00917             bPoseChannel *pchan;
00918             for (pchan = obact->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan = pchan->next) {
00919                 if (arm->layer & pchan->bone->layer) {
00920                     if (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_SELECTED) {
00921                         copy_v3_v3(vec, pchan->pose_head);
00922                         mul_m4_v3(obact->obmat, vec);
00923                         add_v3_v3(centroid, vec);
00924                         DO_MINMAX(vec, min, max);
00925                         count++;
00926                     }
00927                 }
00928             }
00929         }
00930         else {
00931             CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Object *, ob, selected_objects) {
00932                 copy_v3_v3(vec, ob->obmat[3]);
00933 
00934                 /* special case for camera -- snap to bundles */
00935                 if (ob->type == OB_CAMERA) {
00936                     /* snap to bundles should happen only when bundles are visible */
00937                     if (v3d->flag2 & V3D_SHOW_RECONSTRUCTION) {
00938                         bundle_midpoint(scene, ob, vec);
00939                     }
00940                 }
00941 
00942                 add_v3_v3(centroid, vec);
00943                 DO_MINMAX(vec, min, max);
00944                 count++;
00945             }
00946             CTX_DATA_END;
00947         }
00948         if (count) {
00949             if (v3d->around == V3D_CENTROID) {
00950                 mul_v3_fl(centroid, 1.0f / (float)count);
00951                 copy_v3_v3(curs, centroid);
00952             }
00953             else {
00954                 mid_v3_v3v3(curs, min, max);
00955             }
00956         }
00957     }
00958     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SPACE | ND_SPACE_VIEW3D, v3d);
00959     
00960     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00961 }
00962 
00963 void VIEW3D_OT_snap_cursor_to_selected(wmOperatorType *ot)

00965     /* identifiers */

00968     ot->idname = "VIEW3D_OT_snap_cursor_to_selected";

00974     /* flags */

00979 
00980 static int snap_curs_to_active(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00981 {
00982     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00983     Object *obact = CTX_data_active_object(C);
00984     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00985     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
00986     float *curs;
00987     
00988     curs = give_cursor(scene, v3d);
00989 
00990     if (obedit) {
00991         if (obedit->type == OB_MESH) {
00992             /* check active */
00993             Mesh *me = obedit->data;
00994             BMEditSelection ese;
00995             
00996             if (BM_select_history_active_get(me->edit_btmesh->bm, &ese)) {
00997                 BM_editselection_center(&ese, curs);
00998             }
00999             
01000             mul_m4_v3(obedit->obmat, curs);
01001         }
01002     }
01003     else {
01004         if (obact) {
01005             copy_v3_v3(curs, obact->obmat[3]);
01006         }
01007     }
01008     
01009     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SPACE | ND_SPACE_VIEW3D, v3d);
01010     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01011 }

01059 /* **************************************************** */
01060 
01061 
01062 int minmax_verts(Object *obedit, float *min, float *max)
01063 {
01064     TransVert *tv;
01065     float centroid[3], vec[3], bmat[3][3];
01066     int a;
01067 
01068     tottrans = 0;
01069     if (ELEM5(obedit->type, OB_ARMATURE, OB_LATTICE, OB_MESH, OB_SURF, OB_CURVE))
01070         make_trans_verts(obedit, bmat[0], bmat[1], TM_ALL_JOINTS);
01071     
01072     if (tottrans == 0) return 0;
01073 
01074     copy_m3_m4(bmat, obedit->obmat);
01075     
01076     tv = transvmain;
01077     for (a = 0; a < tottrans; a++, tv++) {
01078         copy_v3_v3(vec, (tv->flag & TX_VERT_USE_MAPLOC) ? tv->maploc : tv->loc);
01079         mul_m3_v3(bmat, vec);
01080         add_v3_v3(vec, obedit->obmat[3]);
01081         add_v3_v3(centroid, vec);
01082         DO_MINMAX(vec, min, max);
01083     }
01084     
01085     MEM_freeN(transvmain);
01086     transvmain = NULL;
01087     
01088     return 1;
01089 }
